timelineItems.desc: First Half begins.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Sporting Kansas City vs. New York Red Bulls

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.desc: Sporting Kansas City put the early pressure on N.Y.
timelineItems.title: CLEARANCE: Ibrahim Sekagya helps NY dodge an early bullet with a goal line clearance

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Well, that was coming. Toni with his first #MLS goal, and what a beauty of a curler. #SportingKC #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: The Midnight Ride
timelineItems.text: Apparently Luis Robles has a force field protecting his net tonight. #SKCvNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: Jason Digos Jr.
timelineItems.text: It really should be 4-0 SKC right now so can we count that beauty as 4? Damn. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: ExtraTime Radio
timelineItems.text: Antonio Dovale...welcome to #MLS. That's been coming from the opening whistle. Someone want to close him down? #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: I said over and over how good Toni looked against #TFC on Friday; nice to see him back me up on the assertion. #SportingKC #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Gustavo Brazil
timelineItems.text: My first time in a red bull game :D had so much fun even though the reffs fucked us over -_- !!! #nyrb #soccer #game #newyorkredbulls #redbullarena #nj

timelineItems.name: Andrew Grumke
timelineItems.text: 'Merica #kansascity #merica #kc #skc #sportingkc #sportingpark #sportingkansascity #vsco... http://t.co/peMPsk4pby http://t.co/WpOEEU3Tk0

timelineItems.name: Andrew Grumke
timelineItems.text: 'Merica #kansascity #merica #kc #skc #sportingkc #sportingpark #sportingkansascity #vsco... http://t.co/peMPsk4pby http://t.co/WpOEEU3Tk0

timelineItems.comment: Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Dovale puts @SportingKC up 1-0 after a slew of close chances: http://t.co/S7WgTh2i6d Gotta think more goals are in this one. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Ben Baer
timelineItems.text: The lack of pressure by the Red Bulls in dangerous areas is alarming. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Alexi Lalas
timelineItems.text: Can a team have 101% possession? #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Eric Alexander (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.desc: Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Bradley Wright-Phillips takes down Benny Feilhaber

timelineItems.comment: Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Karel Hill
timelineItems.text: You'd think Benny was made of peanut brittle the way he goes down and rolls around #Skc #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Ruben Bover Izquierdo.

timelineItems.name: Still Dre
timelineItems.text: Henry and Wright-Phillips definitely going to find some space to work with over the course of the match. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City).
Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 18' Aurelien Collin fouls Thierry Henry at midfield. Always fun to watch those Frenchmen battle it out. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.desc: Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Dax McCarty is booked for his late challenge

timelineItems.comment: Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ruben Bover Izquierdo (New York Red Bulls).
Attempt blocked. Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.
Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 19' Bover Izquierdo slides into Feilhaber at the center circle and is whistled for a foul. 1-0 #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Sporting Kansas City 1, New York Red Bulls 1.

timelineItems.name: Cass
timelineItems.text: If I could frame that point and hang it up for proud display, I would. Well done #RBNY. A tale of two halves, if ever there was one. #SKCVNY

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: #SportingKC + #RBNY share the spoils in a turbo-charged contest: http://t.co/BPcEdIiIzy #SKCvNY http://t.co/b5BIM0ZZHe

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: #SportingKC + #RBNY share the spoils in a turbo-charged contest: http://t.co/BPcEdIiIzy #SKCvNY http://t.co/b5BIM0ZZHe

timelineItems.desc: Two teams looking to reverse recent skids, the New York Red Bulls and Sporting Kansas City, play in an early week match-up at Sporting Park, where the top two goal scorers in MLS in SKC's Dom Dwyer and New York's Bradley Wright-Phillips face off.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Sporting Kansas City vs. New York Red Bulls | May 27, 2014

timelineItems.name: Steve Vockrodt
timelineItems.text: New York Energy Drinks tackling pretty hard. Dax McCarty shown yellow for taking out Juliao in the 20th minute. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).
Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Luis Robles (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
timelineItems.title: FOUL: Contact on Luis Robles takes goal off the board

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: #RBNY players basically competing to be excused having to play another 45 of this. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Steve Vockrodt
timelineItems.text: Pace has slowed here quite a bit. SKC came out like, um, Red Bulls in a china shop. Took it to NY for a bit. Not much going on now. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City).
Luis Robles (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Hand ball by Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 25' Ellis puts the ball in the net but the goal is disallowed. Robles had possession before Ellis barged into him to jar it loose. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Steve Vockrodt
timelineItems.text: Apparent goal by Kevin Ellis waved off. Confetti cannons fire. All for naught. Now NY has a free kick near KC goal. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Christopher Weyrauch
timelineItems.text: Aurelian Collin hissy fit dot gif #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Sporting KC score but only after foul on Robles leads to the chance. Good call from the officiating crew to disallow it. #RBNY #SKC #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Sporting KC score but only after a foul on Robles leads to the chance. Good call from the officiating crew. #RBNY #SKC #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: A free kick is never "against the run of play", Mr. Commentator. Nor a throw in or a goalkick for that matter. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 27' And now SKC break on the counter attack. New York retreats and eventually the home side gives away possession. 1-0 #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: James H
timelineItems.text: We’ve secretly replaced #RBNY with Chivas USA. Let’s see if anyone notices. #SKCvNY ⚽️

timelineItems.name: Matty D
timelineItems.text: Pano view #KMBCeen @sportingpark field level #SKCvNY http://t.co/kUSTzTvqEs

timelineItems.name: Matty D
timelineItems.text: Pano view #KMBCeen @sportingpark field level #SKCvNY http://t.co/kUSTzTvqEs

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: Scare them into action, Mike. Take Henry off now - and tell 'em you won't bring him back til they stop being awful. #RBNY #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: And we're off at Sporting Park! Watch on ESPN2 + follow along here: http://t.co/xUCEwTfpeQ #SKCvNY http://t.co/LG7ipYlna8

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: And we're off at Sporting Park! Watch on ESPN2 + follow along here: http://t.co/xUCEwTfpeQ #SKCvNY http://t.co/LG7ipYlna8

timelineItems.name: Steve Vockrodt
timelineItems.text: Igor Juliao opens things up nicely in the 2nd minute with a clear look on New York's goal. Slick chip shot cleared off the line. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Luke McGlynn
timelineItems.text: Let's rain blue @SportingPark #SKCvNY @SouthStandSC #3pts http://t.co/CHQxUQtL46

timelineItems.name: Luke McGlynn
timelineItems.text: Let's rain blue @SportingPark #SKCvNY @SouthStandSC #3pts http://t.co/CHQxUQtL46

timelineItems.name: Mallory Conley
timelineItems.text: 9 rows back, don't mind if I do. #ibelievethatwewillwin #sportingkc #skc #skcvny

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: DUVALL, OFF THE LINE! Wow, Red Bulls almost go down early again but Duvall is there to clean up Juliao's shot. #RBNY #SKC #SKCvNY

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Toni (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: CLEARANCE: Olave clears another ball off the back line

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Aurelien Collin (Sporting Kansas City) header from the center of the box misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Aurelien Collin can't steer header towards goal

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Chris Duvall.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 30' Zizzo dribbles at Duvall and wins SKC a corner kick along the left byline. Benny trots over to take... 1-0 #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Benny Feilhaber with a cross following a corner.
Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls).
Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Shawn Daugherty
timelineItems.text:
Up close and personal with the South Stand American flag on display.

#SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 33' Olave brings Dwyer to the ground 35 yards from goal. Feilhaber's resulting free kick is curled far post and Robles collects. 1-0 #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: Easy, Jamison. They play Collin rules in KC. His tackles are "gutsy". Yours will be deemed reckless. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Matty D
timelineItems.text: Aurelien Collin @ampc2 with a show of sportsmanship. #KMBCeen KC up 1-0 #SKCvNY http://t.co/AWtI4qiddZ

timelineItems.name: Matty D
timelineItems.text: Aurelien Collin @ampc2 with a show of sportsmanship. #KMBCeen KC up 1-0 #SKCvNY http://t.co/AWtI4qiddZ

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: Dovale curls in a beauty, opens his @SportingKC account: http://t.co/o2divmopPv #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Thierry Henry tries a through ball, but Bradley Wright-Phillips is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Thomas Caito
timelineItems.text: No worries Dwyer, you'll have more chances. Especially how #NYRB are playing. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Bailee Howard
timelineItems.text: 1-1 at half! #sportingpark #skcVny

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Juliao is gonna cost some team in Spain or Portugal about $5 million in a couple-few years. Just 19 years old. #SportingKC #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: russthaler
timelineItems.text: Anthem, check. Tifo, check. Kickoff next! #SKCvNY @nbcsn @nbcsportssoccer

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Sal Zizzo (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Toni with a cross.

timelineItems.title: CROSSBAR: Benny Feilhaber whacks the bar on the free kick

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Juliao! Goal-line clearance! Could've been 1-0 to the home side real early. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Toni (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Dominic Dwyer with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Still Dre
timelineItems.text: some solid 1v1 defending on both ends of the pitch #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City).
Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alex Martinez (Sporting Kansas City).
Foul by Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City).
Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Igor Julião.

timelineItems.name: Ian Armas Foster
timelineItems.text: This #SKCvNY game, which features last year's MLS Cup and Supporters Shield winners, is sloppy. Not their fault though, so many absences

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 44' Alexander plays a nice through ball down the left side for Duvall, whose far post cross is headed out for a New York corner. 1-0 #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: New York Red Bulls
timelineItems.text: 45' Dangerous Henry service bounces in the box but Kronberg able to gather. One minute of added time. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Sporting Kansas City 1, New York Red Bulls 0.

timelineItems.name: Yashar Borhani
timelineItems.text: Really have to admire the way @SportingKC play. Model for future of American soccer both in managment and style #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Los
timelineItems.text: There's no sense of urgency, no hustle from the Red Bulls. They need to wake up in the second half. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Violeta Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: Viendo jugar al #SportingKC contra #NewYorkRedBulls en #kansascity

timelineItems.name: Ben Emery
timelineItems.text: I'm guessing the #RBNY offense shows up after half-time...Good thing their defense got there early. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Alex Tawney
timelineItems.text: Collin has been great so far. Really nice to have a guy healthy who actually plays center back. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Brittany Bryson
timelineItems.text: #SportingKc vs #NewYorkRedBulls with the wings team! ❤️�

timelineItems.name: Ezra
timelineItems.text: LETS GO SPORTING! #SPORTINGKC #chasingthebull #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Grant McCool
timelineItems.text: Duvall's performance is the only bright spot for #RBNY tonight so far. Don't go away folks, 2nd half coming up #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Sporting Kansas City 1, New York Red Bulls 0.
Attempt blocked. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Dax McCarty.
Delay in match Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Sporting Kansas City 1, New York Red Bulls 1. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Bradley Wright-Phillips bangs in the equalizer

timelineItems.name: ☀MichaelG☀️
timelineItems.text: Dwyer & Wright-Phillips both with 10 goals in 12 game..should be an interesting match up! #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Ibrahim Sekagya (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: 4 minutes gone, already 2 goal line clearances by #RBNY. #SportingKC all over them early. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 5' Sporting come close again! Zizzo's header was bound for goal but New York makes a crucial block! 0-0 #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Teshawn Edmonds
timelineItems.text: Team colors (both @adidasUS): @NewYorkRedBulls: Dark Marine Blue/Sunshine Yellow; @SportingKC: Smoke Blue/Dark Indigo #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) hits the bar with a right footed shot from outside the box from a direct free kick.
Attempt missed. Alex Martinez (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Off the line again! Sekagya clears a shot that appeared to have beaten Robles. Red Bulls defense disastrous early on. #RBNY #SKC #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 51' Goal New York! Wright-Phillips scores his @MLS leading 11th of the season as he gets on the end of a Thierry Henry through ball. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Los
timelineItems.text: YESSSSSSS!!!! @TheRealBWP strikes!!!!! #rbny #SKCvNY #runwithus

timelineItems.name: Steve Vockrodt
timelineItems.text: Wow, all that killer play early on by SKC only to concede a goal in the 50th minute. 1-1 #SKCvNY Wright-Phillips with 11th goal of season.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Bit o' confusion in the back for #SportingKC. Collin and Juliao were…somewhere south of Louisburg. Shouts of offside. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Eric Kronberg Stuffs Wright-Phillips

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: REPLAY: Bradley Wright-Phillips left footed shot is saved

timelineItems.name: Ryan Krasnoo
timelineItems.text: Thierry Henry has the vision and touch of a wizard. That ball to Wright-Phillips was sublime. #RBNY #SKCvNY @MLS

timelineItems.name: Michelle E. Park
timelineItems.text: #sportingkc v. #newyorkredbulls ⚽️

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: BWP!! Stay awake now, lads. Don't where that came from, but go back to that place. Often. #SKCvNY #RBNY

timelineItems.name: KMBC
timelineItems.text: Wright-Phillips scores for NY. @SportingKC tied 1-1 51:36 #SKCvNY #KMBCeen http://t.co/fAinL7gLdB

timelineItems.name: KMBC
timelineItems.text: Wright-Phillips scores for NY. @SportingKC tied 1-1 51:36 #SKCvNY #KMBCeen http://t.co/fAinL7gLdB

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: BWP, who else? This is becoming a thing. #SKCvNY #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! BWP, who else? This is becoming a thing: http://t.co/R5sFvIESF8 #SKCvNY #RBNY

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 53' Massive save from Kronberg to deny Wright-Phillips! The striker was through on goal after NY countered, but Kronny came up big! #SKCvNY

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Sal Zizzo (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Sal Zizzo’s deflected shot sneaks wide

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 55' New York on the ascendancy after being outplayed in the first half. Should be an interesting final 35 minutes. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Alex Martinez tries a through ball, but Igor Julião is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Alex Tawney
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls have been way better since their awful first ten minutes. Really wish one of those first three chances had gone in. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Sal Zizzo (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Alex Martinez.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Jamison Olave.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls) because of an injury.
Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Paulo Nagamura tries a through ball, but Dominic Dwyer is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sal Zizzo.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: 5 minutes gone… two goal line clearances and a crossbar smashed. Do those count for 1/3 goals? #SportingKC #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: ANOTHER goal-line clearance from #RBNY! This is gonna be a fun one, guys. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: New York Red Bulls
timelineItems.text: 5' That was close. Feilhaber free kick goes over the wall and off the underside of the crossbar but not over the end line. Still 0-0 #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: It makes perfect sense that the team with its sixth-string CB in the game is the one not struggling at the back right now. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: John Corbett
timelineItems.text: seems Red Bull could use more caffeine out there #RBNY #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Kevin Ellis.

timelineItems.name: Chris Hoenig
timelineItems.text: First time I've seen an @MLS game where both keepers are wearing the same kit. #RBNY #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Eric Kronberg (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.desc: Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Kevin Ellis knocks down Lloyd Sam on a challenge

timelineItems.name: Gary Hampson
timelineItems.text: Why no yellow card for intentional handball out of the 18? #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Steve Vockrodt
timelineItems.text: Bradley Wright-Phillips ain't no joke. He could end up killing SKC here late. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 62' Bizarre circumstances result in a New York free kick 22 yards from goal, and the four-man SKC wall blocks Henry's shot. 1-1 #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City).
Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) header from the center of the box is just a bit too high.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Dwyer snaps a header over the bar

timelineItems.name: Tyler Gray
timelineItems.text: @SportingKC are playing pretty entitled right now. When things don't go their way they lash out with fouls and complain too much. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Bill Reno
timelineItems.text: Kronberg’s handball is one of the more laughable mistakes I’ve ever seen in MLS. Even if he thought there was a whistle. #SKCvNY

Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 64' Sekagya chests it down on the left side of the box and chips it far post, but it floats out of play. Goal kick for Kronny. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Bradley Wright-Phillips.
Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Eric Kronberg.

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: This Igor Juliao guy might turn out to be something good. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Jeffrey Wiegand
timelineItems.text: 'Who's your daddy referee' came through a little too clear on @espn #nsfESPN #SKCvNY #LoveThePassion

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Thierry Henry cracks a curler into Kronberg's lap

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 66' Dangerous move from substitute Peguy Luyindula as he cuts into the middle and fires low. Kronberg gets down to make the save. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Marc Serber
timelineItems.text: #NYRB looking like a completely different squad in this second half. This one has gone from ALL SKC to anybodys game #SKCvNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: BWP overtakes Dwyer in the Budweiser Golden Boot race. WATCH: http://t.co/b1nGe2TN5v #SKCvNY http://t.co/XnpojccgPu

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: BWP overtakes Dwyer in the Budweiser Golden Boot race. WATCH: http://t.co/b1nGe2TN5v #SKCvNY http://t.co/XnpojccgPu

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Péguy Luyindula.

timelineItems.name: Grant McCool
timelineItems.text: Henry and Peguy worked that short corner routine in Paris back in the day #RBNY #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: New York Red Bulls
timelineItems.text: 68' Good 1-v-1 defending by Sekagya there to dispossess Dwyer then earn a goal kick. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 67' Now Henry tees up a shot, and again Kronberg gobbles up the low, right-footed curler. Good spell from the keeper. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Johnathon Justice
timelineItems.text: Henry is single handedly picking apart the #SKC defense...okay he has a little help but def looking up to the task tonight #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Alexi Lalas
timelineItems.text: Does #RBNY know the game has started? #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 69' Martinez plays through to an onside Dwyer, who is then forced to dribble away from goal. SKC still with possession. 1-1 #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Jamison Olave (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).
Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Kevin Ellis.

timelineItems.name: Germaine
timelineItems.text: The atmosphere inside these @MLS stadiums is unbelievable... I love that the sport continues to grow in the U.S. #MLS #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Olivia Brestal
timelineItems.text: Dom Dwyer has been playing out of his mind these last few games. Seems to be involved in every play. Dangerous dude right now. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Ibrahim Sekagya (New York Red Bulls) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Foul by Jimmy Medranda (Sporting Kansas City).
Eric Alexander (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Toni (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Robles dives to stop Toni's quick strike

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Toni (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: REPLAY: Toni's strike saved by Robles

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Toni (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Attempt missed. Kevin Ellis (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Benny Feilhaber with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Luis Robles.

timelineItems.name: New York Red Bulls
timelineItems.text: 79' Huge save from Robles on Dovale left footed strike. #RBNY #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 8' Strong start for SKC. They look full of energy and will be ruing their luck for not grabbing a goal already. 0-0 #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: 2 goal-line clearances. 1 off the woodwork. All in the first 5 minutes. Get yourself over to ESPN2. RIght meow. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: There. Is. So. Much. Space. Between Duvall at RB and Olave at CB. Alex Martinez should consider occupying it. #SportingKC #SKCvNY

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Sporting Kansas City 1, New York Red Bulls 0. Toni (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Toni pounds in an early goal

timelineItems.name: Still Dre
timelineItems.text: With all those bodies in front of him, great save by Robles. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Soony Saad (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Benny Feilhaber.
Offside, New York Red Bulls. Péguy Luyindula tries a through ball, but Bradley Wright-Phillips is caught offside.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Bobby Convey.

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 84' Saad winds up a long range blast from 35 yards and it's blocked. New York in possession briefly before BWP is flagged offside. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Ivan Aguirre
timelineItems.text:
At the office.
#SportingPark #SKCvNY

timelineItems.desc: Toni (Sporting Kansas City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Toni rips down Eric Alexander from behind

timelineItems.comment: Eric Alexander (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Toni (Sporting Kansas City).
Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls).
Offside, New York Red Bulls. Bobby Convey tries a through ball, but Bradley Wright-Phillips is caught offside.
Foul by Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City).
Bobby Convey (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Armando (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: 90+4' Dangerous cross whipped in by Alexander, but Akpan couldn't direct his header on goal! 1-1 #SKCvNY

timelineItems.comment: Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: WeFollowFutbol
timelineItems.text: FT - @SportingKC 1-1 @NewYorkRedBulls. Not a bad match considering all of the international absences. #SKCvNY #mls

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Jamison Olave.
Second Half ends, Sporting Kansas City 1, New York Red Bulls 1.

timelineItems.text: It's wet. #SKCvNY http://t.co/9Cu5dICFtC

timelineItems.text: It's wet. #SKCvNY http://t.co/9Cu5dICFtC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC has yet to allow a first half goal from the run of play this season, a 16-game streak that dates back to 2013. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: No team in @MLS has conceded fewer shots than @SportingKC. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Tonight is the first of three #SKCvNY meetings. SKC travels to NY on 9/6 before hosting them on 10/26 in the reg. season finale. #SKCvNY

timelineItems.name: Matt Russell
timelineItems.text: T-minus 15 minutes until Operation Sacré Backline. T-minus 2 hours 15 minutes until Operation Rent is Too High. #SKCvNY #USAvAZE

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
